bg-color.description: The background color of the entire component

index.description: The identifier is used to distinguish which one was clicked when clicked, and the index when using the v-for loop can be used
index.description_zh: 标识符，点击时候用于区分点击了哪一个，用v-for循环时的index即可

disabled.description: Whether to disable the swiping of a swipeAction

vibrate-short.description: Whether it causes the phone to vibrate for a short time is currently only effective in the WeChat Mini Program and WeChat Mini Program Development Tools of iOS
vibrate-short.description_zh: 是否使手机发生短促震动，目前只在iOS的微信小程序和微信小程序开发工具有效

:show.description: Turn a component on or off
:show.description_zh: 打开或者关闭某个组件

:options.description: The configuration parameters of the button group, in the form of an array, are described above
:options.description_zh: 按钮组的配置参数，数组形式，见上方说明

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked
events.params: (index1, index)，见上方"点击事件"的说明

events.name: close
events.description: When a component triggers a shutdown state

events.name: open
events.description: When the component triggers the open state
